result.title: Report on roadmap implementation and protocol for implementation monitoring
result.description: Report on roadmap implementation and a protocol for implementation monitoring. The report and protocol detail an indicator framework for monitoring progress in implementing roadmaps and monitoring changes in resilience. The aim is to enable stakeholders and policy makers, who will use the roadmaps after project completion, to track progress, reassess priorities and timelines, and to update roadmaps (month 48). P3 is responsible, together with P2.

result.title: Design of the plan for dissemination, exploitation and communication activities.
result.description: Design of the plan for dissemination, exploitation and communication activities. P9 is responsible, in close collaboration with P1 (month 3).
